area: Rattray Head to Berwick upon Tweed (2)

forecast.wind: Cyclonic 3 to 5 at first in far south, otherwise easterly 7 to severe gale 9 veering or becoming southeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first in north.
forecast.sea: High at first in north, otherwise rough or very rough, becoming moderate or rough later.
